recipes.label: An Opportunity at Vermaet
recipes.startdescription: Amsterdams canal-district is filled with a heady mix of classist snobbism and down to earth materialism. This means I am allowed to enter Vermaet through the front door, but I do have to wait until they handle their customers, even though they called me. When Rogier Vermaet finally turns to me, he pulls a little box from under the table. "This seemed perhaps too interesting for our regualr clientell, we thought to offer it to you first."
